metadata.title: Wednesday, 9th December, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Vice President and Minister of Development Planning
parts: (a)    whether new projects approved in the 2016 Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure will not be implemented following the directive by the President during a press Conference recently; and
(b)    if so, when implementation of the affected projects will commence.
(a)    what the current status on the recruitment exercise of staff in the Zambia Army, Zambia Air force and Zambia National Service, is;
(b)    whether the list of successful candidates that was published on various social media fora is authentic; and
(c)    if not, when the exercise will be completed.
(a)    how much money the Government owes each mining company in form of Value Added Tax refunds; and

(b)    when the amounts owed will be paid off. NOTICE OF MOTION AND ORDER OF THE DAY The Minister of Finance Supply: That the House do now resolve into Committee of Supply to consider Supplementary Estimates No. 1 of 2015. 1    The Constitution of Zambia (Amendment) Bill                                                                            (N.A.B. 17/2015) Committee Stage
